analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#253-256) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#267-273)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#276-280)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#283-294)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#298-300)

Luckyblock.play (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#756-821) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenAddresses[i]).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenCount[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#793-798)
	-ERC20Interface(_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenAddresses[k]).transfer(msg.sender,_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenCount[k]) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol)

Luckyblock.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20.transfer(to,erc20.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol)
	-erc20.transfer(to,balance) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20Interface(_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenAddresses[k]).transfer(msg.sender,_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenCount[k]) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenAddresses[j]).balanceOf(address(this)) >= earnTokenCount) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#805-810)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenAddresses[i]).balanceOf(address(msg.sender)) >= _luckyblockSpend.spendTokenCount[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#780-785)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenAddresses[i]).allowance(address(msg.sender),address(this)) >= _luckyblockSpend.spendTokenCount[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#785-792)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20Interface(_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenAddresses[i]).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenCount[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8a6ca6633d31135d9340e04698854225e3b898f7.sol#793-798)
